description: Updates an Amazon Q Business web experience.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application attached to the web experience.

parameters.name: webExperienceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business web experience.

parameters.name: authenticationConfiguration
parameters.description: The authentication configuration of the Amazon Q Business web experience. samlConfiguration (dict) --- Provides the SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP) configuration information Amazon Q Business needs to deploy a Amazon Q Business web experience. The metadata XML that your IdP generated. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role assumed by users when they authenticate into their Amazon Q Business web experience, containing the relevant Amazon Q Business permissions for conversing with Amazon Q Business. The user attribute name in your IdP that maps to the user email. userGroupAttribute (string) --- The group attribute name in your IdP that maps to user groups.

nested_params.name: samlConfiguration
nested_params.description: Provides the SAML 2.0 compliant identity provider (IdP) configuration information Amazon Q Business needs to deploy a Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_params.name: metadataXML
nested_params.description: The metadata XML that your IdP generated.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role assumed by users when they authenticate into their Amazon Q Business web experience, containing the relevant Amazon Q Business permissions for conversing with Amazon Q Business.

nested_params.name: userIdAttribute
nested_params.description: The user attribute name in your IdP that maps to the user email.

nested_params.name: userGroupAttribute
nested_params.description: The group attribute name in your IdP that maps to user groups.

parameters.name: identityProviderConfiguration
parameters.description: Information about the identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience. samlConfiguration (dict) --- Information about the SAML 2.0-compliant identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience. The URL where Amazon Q Business end users will be redirected for authentication. openIDConnectConfiguration (dict) --- Information about the OIDC-compliant identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a Secrets Manager secret containing the OIDC client secret. An IAM role with permissions to access KMS to decrypt the Secrets Manager secret containing your OIDC client secret.

nested_params.name: samlConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about the SAML 2.0-compliant identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_params.name: authenticationUrl
nested_params.description: The URL where Amazon Q Business end users will be redirected for authentication.

nested_params.name: openIDConnectConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about the OIDC-compliant identity provider (IdP) used to authenticate end users of an Amazon Q Business web experience.

nested_params.name: secretsArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a Secrets Manager secret containing the OIDC client secret.

nested_params.name: secretsRole
nested_params.description: An IAM role with permissions to access KMS to decrypt the Secrets Manager secret containing your OIDC client secret.

parameters.name: origins
parameters.description: Updates the website domain origins that are allowed to embed the Amazon Q Business web experience. The domain origin refers to the base URL for accessing a website including the protocol ( http/https), the domain name, and the port number (if specified). (string) ---

parameters.name: browserExtensionConfiguration
parameters.description: The browser extension configuration for an Amazon Q Business web experience. Specify the browser extensions allowed for your Amazon Q web experience. CHROME -- Enables the extension for Chromium-based browsers (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Opera, etc.). FIREFOX -- Enables the extension for Mozilla Firefox. CHROME and FIREFOX -- Enable the extension for Chromium-based browsers and Mozilla Firefox. (string) ---

nested_params.name: enabledBrowserExtensions
nested_params.description: Specify the browser extensions allowed for your Amazon Q web experience.

parameters.name: customizationConfiguration
parameters.description: Updates the custom logo, favicon, font, and color used in the Amazon Q web experience. customCSSUrl (string) --- Provides the URL where the custom CSS file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience. logoUrl (string) --- Provides the URL where the custom logo file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience. fontUrl (string) --- Provides the URL where the custom font file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience. faviconUrl (string) --- Provides the URL where the custom favicon file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_params.name: customCSSUrl
nested_params.description: Provides the URL where the custom CSS file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_params.name: logoUrl
nested_params.description: Provides the URL where the custom logo file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_params.name: fontUrl
nested_params.description: Provides the URL where the custom font file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.

nested_params.name: faviconUrl
nested_params.description: Provides the URL where the custom favicon file is hosted for an Amazon Q web experience.
